owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPrice(address,int256).details: set new price for the NFT

params._usdPrice: usd price of NFT token (decimal is 8)

setUpdaters(address[],bool[]).details: set new updaters that can write NFT price

setWhiteList(address[],bool[]).details: set whitelisted address that can read oracle price data

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns._0: usd & ether price of NFT token

etherPriceAggregator.details: chainlink Price feed for ETH / USD

isWhiteListed.details: return true when address can read oracle price data

isUpdater(address).notice: return true if address can update price
